name: Finding Otonia
description:
You awaken from a dream where a figure was trying to tell you something, with your memories and who you even are all gone. the only the that remains is the phrase "Find Otonia". In this RPG adventure, you will endevour to find the hidden land and discover more about yourself as you learn new skills and gain new traits in order to face the challenges on the road to Otonia! 

The Game is played only with your mouse. Click the desired options and see information about your character by clicking the top left book.

This Game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021
